ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and (Cartons__c =true, or( ISBLANK( B2BCartons__c ), ISBLANK( B2CCartons__c ), ISBLANK( Qty_ConnotesCartons__c ), ISBLANK( Qty_Items_cartons__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure that B2B%,B2C%, Qty Items and Qty Connotes fields for Cartons are not blank
